name: LUP★SALAD
description:
Join Salad on her adventures in the Puzzle Kingdom!
Master simple, yet deep, block challenges in over 300 wonderfully weird stages.
Enjoy the unique art style and story of Izumi Takemoto in this addictive platforming puzzler!
Download this PS one® Classic today.
This title has been converted from the original PlayStation® disc to PS3™ system. Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation® disc version, or where some features may not function properly. This version does not support PlayStation® peripherals (controller, memory card, multitap, etc.), therefore functionalities such as multiplayer, versus, and co-op modes are not available.
"PS one" is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
Purchase indicates acceptance of the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service/User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase this item.
